name: Trans-Siberian Legends
description:
You are a passenger on a train traveling along the Trans-Siberian Railway. Your goal is to get to the end point.



The game consists of several stages with an interesting plot.



You can walk around cities, look out the window and watch the changes in nature, weather and architecture, listen to the radio and communicate with passengers. You can see forests, fields, mountains, cities and villages.



The game offers you an exciting journey through Russia by train, full of adventures, discoveries and emotions.
